name: add_watermark
description: Add watermark to image (text or image watermark) with customizable position, opacity, and styling options.

image_path.description: Path to the input image file

watermark_text.description: Text to use as watermark (either this or watermark_image_path must be provided)

watermark_image_path.description: Path to watermark image file (either this or watermark_text must be provided)

position.description: Position of watermark on the image

opacity.description: Opacity of watermark (0.0-1.0). 0.0 is transparent, 1.0 is fully opaque

output_path.description: Path for the output image. If not provided, will create watermarked version with suffix
